argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hosd1.2 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hosd1.3 | |- U : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 |  | #P_ho0f | |- 0hop : ~H --> ~H |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_hosubcli | |- ( 0hop -op U ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_hoaddcli | |- ( T +op U ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( ( 0hop -op U ) +op ( T +op U ) ) = ( ( T +op U ) +op ( 0hop -op U ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 3, 2 | #P_hoaddsubassi | |- ( ( ( T +op U ) +op 0hop ) -op U ) = ( ( T +op U ) +op ( 0hop -op U ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( ( 0hop -op U ) +op ( T +op U ) ) = ( ( ( T +op U ) +op 0hop ) -op U ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_hoaddid1i | |- ( ( T +op U ) +op 0hop ) = ( T +op U ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( ( T +op U ) +op 0hop ) -op U ) = ( ( T +op U ) -op U ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 2 | #P_hoaddsubi | |- ( ( T +op U ) -op U ) = ( ( T -op U ) +op U ) |
| 12 | 1, 2 | #P_hosubcli | |- ( T -op U ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 13 | 12, 2 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( ( T -op U ) +op U ) = ( U +op ( T -op U ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 1 | #P_hodseqi | |- ( U +op ( T -op U ) ) = T |
| 15 | 11, 13, 14 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( T +op U ) -op U ) = T |
| 16 | 8, 10, 15 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( 0hop -op U ) +op ( T +op U ) ) = T |
| 17 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_hodsi | |- ( ( T -op ( 0hop -op U ) ) = ( T +op U ) <-> ( ( 0hop -op U ) +op ( T +op U ) ) = T ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_mpbir | |- ( T -op ( 0hop -op U ) ) = ( T +op U ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( T +op U ) = ( T -op ( 0hop -op U ) ) |
